targets.rawSql: SELECT $station;
SELECT usaf FROM isd_station WHERE station = '$station';
SELECT wban FROM isd_station WHERE station = '$station';
SELECT ST_AsLatLonText(location) FROM isd_station WHERE station = '$station';
SELECT elevation FROM isd_station WHERE station = '$station';
SELECT country::TEXT FROM isd_station WHERE station = '$station';
SELECT name FROM world_fences WHERE ST_Contains(fence60m, '$location'::GEOMETRY(Point)) ;
SELECT name FROM isd_station WHERE station = '$station';
SELECT period FROM isd_station WHERE station = '$station';
SELECT icao::TEXT FROM isd_station WHERE station = '$station';
SELECT province, city, name FROM china_fences c WHERE ST_Contains(c.fence, '$location'::GEOMETRY);
SELECT extract(year FROM year) AS year,m1,m2,m3,m4,m5,m6,m7,m8,m9,m10,m11,m12,station FROM isd_history WHERE station = '$station';

SELECT station, name, '$location'::GEOMETRY::GEOGRAPHY <-> h.location::GEOGRAPHY AS distance,
       country, ST_AsLatLonText(location) AS location, elevation, begin_date::TEXT AS start, end_date::TEXT AS end
FROM isd_station h
ORDER BY '$location'::GEOMETRY <-> h.location LIMIT 16;

SELECT longitude,
       latitude,
       elevation,
       name,
       station,
       upper(period)::DATE::TEXT  AS mtime,
       country,
       CASE
           WHEN station = '$station' THEN 3
           WHEN upper(period) >= date_trunc('month', CURRENT_DATE) THEN 2
           WHEN upper(period) >= date_trunc('year', CURRENT_DATE) THEN 1
           ELSE 0 END AS category -- 0 active in this month, 1 active in this year, 0 default
FROM isd_station
ORDER BY '$location'::GEOMETRY <-> location LIMIT 32;

SELECT to_char(ts, 'YYYY-MM') AS month, -- 月份
       temp_mean    ,-- 月平均气温
       temp_min     ,-- 月平均最低气温
       temp_max     ,-- 月平均最高气温
       temp_min_avg ,-- 月极端最低气温
       temp_max_avg ,-- 月极端最高气温
       dewp_mean    ,-- 月平均露点
       dewp_min     ,-- 月最低露点
       dewp_max     ,-- 月最高露点
       slp_mean     ,-- 月平均气压
       prcp_sum     ,-- 月总降水
       prcp_max     ,-- 月最大降水
       prcp_mean    ,-- 月平均降水
       wdsp_mean    ,-- 月平均风速
       wdsp_max     ,-- 月最大风速
       gust_max     ,-- 月最大阵风
       sunny_days   ,-- 月晴天日数
       windy_days   ,-- 月大风日数
       foggy_days   ,-- 月雾天日数
       rainy_days   ,-- 月雨天日数
       snowy_days   ,-- 月雪天日数
       hail_days    ,-- 月冰雹日数
       thunder_days ,-- 月雷暴日数
       tornado_days ,-- 月龙卷日数
       hot_days     ,-- 月高温日数
       cold_days    ,-- 月低温日数
       vis_4_days   ,-- 月能见度4km内日数
       vis_10_days  ,-- 月能见度4-10km内日数
       vis_20_days  ,-- 月能见度10-20km内日数
       vis_20p_days  -- 月能见度20km上日数
FROM isd_monthly
WHERE station = '$station' AND ts = '${month}-01'
ORDER BY 1;

SELECT ts::TEXT  AS "日期",
       temp_mean AS "日均气温",
       temp_min  AS "最低气温",
       temp_max  AS "最高气温",
       dewp_mean AS "露点",
       slp_mean  AS "海平面气压",
       stp_mean  AS "站点气压",
       vis_mean  AS "可见度",
       wdsp_mean AS "日均风速",
       wdsp_max  AS "最大风速",
       gust      AS "突发风速",
       prcp      AS "降水",
       sndp      AS "雪深",
       CASE WHEN is_foggy THEN '🌫' ELSE '' END ||
       CASE WHEN is_rainy THEN '🌧' ELSE '' END ||
       CASE WHEN is_snowy THEN '️❄️' ELSE '' END ||
       CASE WHEN is_hail THEN '🌨' ELSE '' END ||
       CASE WHEN is_thunder THEN '⚡' ELSE '' END ||
       CASE WHEN is_tornado THEN '🌪' ELSE '' END AS "天气"
FROM (
         SELECT '$station' AS station, ts::DATE
         FROM generate_series('$month-01', '$month-01'::DATE + '1Month'::INTERVAL - '1Day'::INTERVAL, '1day'::INTERVAL) ts
     ) q
 LEFT JOIN isd_daily data USING (ts, station);

SELECT ts::DATE AS time,
       count(*)       AS count
FROM isd_hourly
WHERE station = '$station' AND $__timeFilter(ts)
GROUP BY ts::DATE
ORDER BY 1 ;

SELECT to_char(ts, 'MM-DD HH:mm') AS time,
       temp,
       dewp,
       slp,
       stp,
       vis,
       wd_angle,
       wd_speed,
       wd_gust,
       wd_code,
       cld_height,
       cld_code,
       sndp,
       prcp,
       prcp_hour,
       prcp_code,
       mw_code,
       aw_code,
       pw_code,
       pw_hour,
       data       
FROM isd_hourly
WHERE station = '$station'
  AND ts >= '$month-01'::DATE
  AND ts < '$month-01'::DATE + '1Month'::INTERVAL
ORDER BY 1;

SELECT ts AS time,
       (NOT is_foggy AND NOT is_rainy AND NOT is_snowy AND NOT is_hail AND NOT is_thunder AND
        NOT is_tornado)::INTEGER AS "晴",
       is_foggy::INTEGER         AS "雾",
       is_rainy::INTEGER         AS "雨",
       is_snowy::INTEGER         AS "雪",
       is_hail::INTEGER          AS "雹",
       is_thunder::INTEGER       AS "雷",
       is_tornado::INTEGER       AS "龙卷"
FROM isd_daily
WHERE station = '$station' AND $__timeFilter(ts);

SELECT ts::DATE AS time,
       temp_mean AS "日平均温度",
       temp_min  AS "日最低温度",
       temp_max  AS "日最高温度"
FROM isd_daily
WHERE station = '$station' AND $__timeFilter(ts);

SELECT ts AS time, temp AS "日内气温"
FROM isd_hourly
WHERE station = '$station' AND $__timeFilter(ts)
ORDER BY 1;

SELECT ts AS time,
       dewp  AS "露点",
       temp AS "温度"
FROM isd_hourly
WHERE station = '$station' AND $__timeFilter(ts)
ORDER BY 1;

SELECT ts::DATE AS time,
       slp_mean  AS "海平面气压",
       1013.25   AS "标准大气压"
FROM isd_daily
WHERE station = '$station' AND $__timeFilter(ts);

SELECT ts AS time,
       slp AS "气压"
FROM isd_hourly
WHERE station = '$station' AND $__timeFilter(ts)
ORDER BY 1;

SELECT ts::DATE AS time,
       wdsp_mean  AS "平均风速"
FROM isd_daily
WHERE station = '$station' AND $__timeFilter(ts);

SELECT ts AS time,
       wd_speed AS "实时风速",
       wd_gust  AS "突发阵风"
FROM isd_hourly
WHERE station = '$station' AND $__timeFilter(ts)
ORDER BY 1;

SELECT ts AS time,
       wd_angle
FROM isd_hourly
WHERE station = '$station' AND $__timeFilter(ts);

SELECT ts AS time,
       CASE WHEN cld_code >= '0' AND cld_code <= '8' THEN cld_code::INTEGER ELSE NULL END AS "云量"
FROM isd_hourly
WHERE station = '$station' AND $__timeFilter(ts)
ORDER BY 1;

SELECT ts AS time,
       vis AS "可见度"
FROM isd_hourly
WHERE station = '$station' AND $__timeFilter(ts)
ORDER BY 1;

SELECT ts::DATE AS time,
       prcp  AS "降水（日度）"
FROM isd_daily
WHERE station = '$station' AND $__timeFilter(ts);

SELECT ts AS time,
       prcp  AS "降水",
       prcp_hour  AS "降水时长"
FROM isd_hourly
WHERE station = '$station' AND $__timeFilter(ts)
ORDER BY 1;

SELECT ts::DATE AS time,
       sndp  AS "积雪（日度）"
FROM isd_daily
WHERE station = '$station' AND $__timeFilter(ts);

SELECT ts AS time,
       sndp  AS "积雪"
FROM isd_hourly
WHERE station = '$station' AND $__timeFilter(ts)
ORDER BY 1;

list.definition: SELECT station FROM isd_station  WHERE period && daterange($__timeFrom()::DATE, $__timeTo()::DATE, '[]');
list.label: Station
list.name: station
list.query: SELECT station FROM isd_station  WHERE period && daterange($__timeFrom()::DATE, $__timeTo()::DATE, '[]');

list.definition: SELECT location FROM isd_station WHERE station = '$station';
list.label: Location
list.name: location
list.query: SELECT location FROM isd_station WHERE station = '$station';

list.definition: SELECT longitude FROM isd_station WHERE station = '$station';
list.label: Longitude
list.name: longitude
list.query: SELECT longitude FROM isd_station WHERE station = '$station';

list.definition: SELECT latitude FROM isd_station WHERE station = '$station';
list.label: Latitude
list.name: latitude
list.query: SELECT latitude FROM isd_station WHERE station = '$station';

list.definition: SELECT substr(generate_series(begin_date, end_date, '1month'::INTERVAL)::DATE::TEXT, 1, 7) from isd_station WHERE station = '$station' ORDER BY 1 DESC;
list.label: 月份
list.name: month
list.query: SELECT substr(generate_series(begin_date, end_date, '1month'::INTERVAL)::DATE::TEXT, 1, 7) from isd_station WHERE station = '$station' ORDER BY 1 DESC;
